content: UFC 284Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-284/matchesMatches(2 points each)13. Islam Makhachev vs. Alexander Volkanovski 12. Yair Rodriguez vs. Josh Emmett 11. Jack Della Maddalena vs. Randy Brown10. Justin Tafa vs. Parker Porter9. Jimmy Crute vs. Alonzo Menifield(1 point each)8. Zubaira Tukhugov vs. Elves Brenner7. Joshua Culibao vs. Melsik Baghdasaryan6. Shannon Ross vs. Kleydson Rodrigues5. Jamie Mullarkey vs. Francisco Prado4. Jack Jenkins vs. Don Shainis3. Loma Lookboonmee vs. Elise Reed2. Shane Young vs. Blake Bilder1. Tyson Pedro vs. Modestas BukauskasHow many matches will NOT go the Full DistanceExample13. Islam Makhachev 12. Yair Rodriguez 11. Jack Della Maddalena 10. Justin Tafa 9. Jimmy Crute 8. Zubaira Tukhugov 7. Joshua Culibao 6. Shannon Ross 5. Jamie Mullarkey 4. Jack Jenkins 3. Loma Lookboonmee 2. Shane Young 1. Tyson Pedro NOT go the Full Distance 5(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion or have an active account with SB *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
